1010000100000000 ; addi r1 = 0
1010001000000101 ; addi r2 = 5
1010001100000001 ; addi r3 = 1
0010010000100001 ; sub r4 = r2 - r1
1100010000000100 ; beq r4, 4
0000010101010010 ; add r5 = r5 + r2
0000000100010011 ; add r1 = r1 + r3
1011111111111100 ; bra -4
0110010001010010 ; mul r4 = r5 * r2
1111000000000111 ; halt ; End Excecution
